list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in the Christian Church) a religious ceremony or ritual regarded as imparting divine grace, such as baptism, the Eucharist and (in the Roman Catholic and many Orthodox Churches) penance and the anointing of the sick.
(in Roman Catholic use) the consecrated elements of the Eucharist, especially the bread or Host.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he heard Mass and received the sacrament
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh nghe thấy khối lượng và nhận được bí tích

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thing of mysterious and sacred significance; a religious symbol.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they used peyote as a sacrament
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ đã sử dụng peyote như một bí tích
